assets.headline: Why this woman is ready to blow up the building industry
assets.indexHeadline: Why this woman is ready to blow up the building industry

Roberts to focus on public work in Victoria after Probuild deal

relatedImages.description: Born Alison Hocking to marine engineer dad John and school teacher mum Helen, Mirams grew up in Sydney’s upper north shore suburb of Lindfield.

Mirams, a quantity surveyor by training, on a site visit.
Mirams, a quantity surveyor by training, on a site visit.
“When Dad died, in his eulogy Mum said in many respects, John got two sons and she got two daughters,” says Mirams.
“When Dad died, in his eulogy Mum said in many respects, John got two sons and she got two daughters,” says Mirams.
“The culture at Multiplex, when I started, was work hard and play harder,” says Mirams. “And it was very addictive.”
